title: Royal India
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Service is quick, accommodating to vegans. Has veg section on the menu, but no vegan desserts. Lots of vegan suitable appetizers. Lunch is buffet style with 2 vegan entrees daily, dinner is a la carte. Easy to miss you have to be looking for it. Service people are attentive and helpful.
